summary: Interlinear gloss to a psalter and canticles of the Gallican version. It also contains some computistical information and notes, such as a list of unlucky days for bloodletting. Written by one hand, but Ker (1957, p. 301) suggests it is not the same of the main text. The computistical material is by the same hand as the glosses. Written in Winchester.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 9r) Gif þu ƿitan mid gesceade þæt gemære termen septuagessimalis

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 9r) and man ne singð leng þæt godes lof alleluian ær þære eastertide.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 9r) Gif þu ƿille ƿitan hu eald se mona beo nu todæg on tƿelf monþum

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 9r) Þus þu miht asmeagean þeah þu ƿille | to hundteontigum ƿintrum fare bisextus sƿa he fare. oððe ænig oþer getæl

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 9r) De diebus malis cuiusque mensis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 9r) Tƿeigen dagas syndon on æghƿilcum onginneð.

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 9r) Butan ælcan tƿeon sƿa hit bið geƿislice. gyme seþe ƿille.

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 13r) Gif þu nite hƿilc concurrent beo on geare. Sec georne hƿilce dæg

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 13r) And sƿa fela nihta | sƿa se mona bið onxi. kalendas aprilis. and sƿa fela epacta þu scealt | haban þi geare

notes.head: Incipit

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 13r) nihta ofer text at the bottom of the page illegible or lost probably 'and eallum cristenmannum on þa tid is blodlætincg forboden, eahtatina nihtum ær hlafmæssan and fif and þrittig nihta ofer hlafmæssan' (DOE corpus)

notes.body: (fol. 15v) ˥ lege þone stan on uppan þam stacan, þæt he beo eall under eorðan. butan þam geƿritenan'þone stan' and 'þam geƿritene' illegible on microfiche, based on Pulsiano 1994
